P

placeCastle(int, Castle.CastleRank, int, int) - Method in class controller.GameController
This method places a castle on the game board at the specified location.
placeComponentOnGameBoard(GameComponents, int, int) - Method in class controller.GameController
Places any game component (tiles/castles, etc.) on the game board.
placeFirstTile(int, int, int) - Method in class controller.GameController
This method takes the player's tile (the first tile given to the player at the beginning of the game) and places it on the game board.
Placeholder - Class in components
A placeholder is a blank type of GameComponent.
Placeholder() - Constructor for class components.Placeholder
Default constructor.
playAllEpochs() - Method in class controller.GameController
Plays all epochs sequentially and ends the game.
playEpoch(int) - Method in class controller.GameController
Plays the epoch specified.
Player - Class in model
This class creates the player object.
Player() - Constructor for class model.Player
Default constructor.
Player(GameInstance.PlayerColor, String, Config) - Constructor for class model.Player
Creates a player with a specified color, name and configuration.
PLAYER_INFO_AREA_COLOR - Variable in class model.Config
 
playerCoins - Variable in class model.Player
 
playerColor - Variable in class model.Player
 
playerInfoArea - Variable in class view.GameView
 
players - Variable in class model.GameInstance
 
playerTiles - Variable in class model.Player
 
PlayingStrategy - Interface in controller
This is the interface for determining the playing strategy of a player.
PlayingStrategyMax - Class in controller
The strategy makes the player choose the move that will maximize his/her scores at that turn.
PlayingStrategyMax() - Constructor for class controller.PlayingStrategyMax
 
PlayingStrategyMin - Class in controller
The strategy makes the player choose the move that will minimize other players scores at that turn.
PlayingStrategyMin() - Constructor for class controller.PlayingStrategyMin
 
PlayingStrategyRandom - Class in controller
The strategy makes the player choose random moves.
PlayingStrategyRandom() - Constructor for class controller.PlayingStrategyRandom
 
PlayingStrategyTryOneByOne - Class in controller
The strategy makes the player choose moves one after the other first place first tile, then place castle and finally draw and place tiles - whichever succeeds first.
PlayingStrategyTryOneByOne() - Constructor for class controller.PlayingStrategyTryOneByOne
 
playOneEpoch() - Method in class controller.GameController
Plays one epoch (executes all the player turns until the game board is used up).
propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent) - Method in class view.GameView
The listener method for the observable property changes of the game instance.
